name: Random Squares v1
description: I was inspired by Herbert W. Franke and his random Squares. The natrual chaos of different squares made it possible to dig deeper into what is possible with a simple shape. Just starting with simple steps and adding more and more features to the art.

name: Random Squares v2
description: These squares are a modified version of the first version of the Random Squares by Gerbert W. Franke.

name: Random Squares v3
description: So far the artwork had been quite boring with just black and white. With a pop of color and a decreased opacity, this reminds me of colored glass windows. I implemented a random function for the color pop.

name: Increasing cicles
description: I got inspired by the artwork from Vera Molnar.
